content:
Gerstenfeld family

1 Gerson GERSTENFELD                 1750 (Abraham)  {census family 301}
 + Temerl KLEINBERGER                1755 (Samuel)

    + Rachel                         1777 - Sep 10, 1816 #3a (Lebel)

       * Pinkas LEMBERGER            1795-96 - 1848 #374
             married 1814 #9
